name: JINAIS (Jinais Is Not An IRC Server)
short_description: An IRC server written in C from scratch. Well, it's not _yet_ a fully featured IRC server. The goal is to make it multi-platformed, highly configurable at compile and run times, to allow it to run on slow machines, using the least amount of resources.
